select seq, title, content content1, to_char(start_date, 'MM') mon, to_char(start_date, 'DD') day2, int_name from AP_SCHEDULE

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AP_SCHEDULE(SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE, INT_DATE, INT_NAME) VALUES(ldk_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, sysdate, #{int_name})
